mapper.sql: uuid, user_uid, order_type, course_uid, order_status, payed_time, is_timeout, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time

select ruo.uuid, ruo.user_uid, ruo.order_type, ruo.course_uid, ruo.order_status, ruo.payed_time, ruo.is_timeout, ruo.create_by, ruo.create_time, ruo.last_update_by, ruo.last_update_time from roncoo_user_order as ruo
